display_name: Overall RDI all oxygen desaturations or arousal
description: RDI at all oxygen desaturations or arousal  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas with arousal) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: 60 * ( hremba + hroa + hnrba + hnroa + carba + caroa + canba + canoa + oarba + oaroa + oanba + oanoa ) / slpprdp
